title: Line Media Console
description:
A customer favorite since its debut, the Line Collection features geometric frames made out of precisely crafted oak or walnut. It's distinguished by its strong horizontal lines that reflect natural landscapes and lend a sense of restfulness and calm. On the Line Media Console (2010), this eye-catching louvered design also serves a purpose, allowing remotes to control devices inside. Its roomy, well-organized interior brings order to electronics, routers, albums, books and anything else that needs a home. Working from his studio in Singapore, designer Nathan Yong designs thoughtful pieces that resonate with a quiet elegance, for which he credits the congestion of city living. “My work is a reflection of my yearning for nature in this concrete jungle,” he says. Made in Malaysia.

What’s inside.
Line Media Console 35 has one door, one adjustable shelf, and one cord escape. The two larger units – Console 55 and Console 70 – have two doors, one adjustable shelf, one drawer, and two cord escapes. All cords route through the bottom panel, leaving the back unblemished by cord escape holes, and allowing the Line Media Console to be placed anywhere in a room; it doesn’t have to be pushed against a wall.
  • Versatile storage solution.
  • Sleek design; louvered doors to allow remotes to control devices inside.
  • Console 35 has one adjustable shelf and cord escape in the bottom panel.
  • Consoles 55 and 70 have one adjustable shelf, one drawer, and two cord escapes.
  • Through-bottom cord escapes allow for flexible placement within a room.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Line Collection
General Dimensions
  • 16" H 55⅛" W 17¾" D
Product Weight
114.5 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty

title: Line Credenza
description:
Designer Nathan Yong creates pieces that project quiet elegance, for which he credits hectic city living. “My work is a reflection of my yearning for nature in this concrete jungle,” he says. The Line Collection (2012) is distinguished by horizontal lines that lend a sense of restfulness. This louvered design also serves a purpose on applicable units, allowing remotes to control devices inside. Line brings order to electronics, barware, tableware, and even office supplies. Made in Malaysia.
  • Sleek design.
  • Versatile storage solution.
  • Louvered doors allows remotes to control devices inside.
  • Through-bottom cord escapes so credenza can float within a room.

title: Eames Storage Unit
description:
The innovative Eames Storage Unit (1950) was designed to be configured to fit a specific space or need. This original is an authentic, fully licensed product of Herman Miller, Inc. Eames is a licensed trademark of Herman Miller.
  • Modular modern storage solution.
  • Two color schemes.
  • Wood and steel.

title: Raleigh Media Unit
description:
With expansive wood uninterrupted by hardware, the Raleigh Media Unit (2024) is a midcentury-inspired storage solution for electronics, books, and more. Its drawers, doors, and legs are beautifully crafted from solid wood with an expertly veneered top in oak or walnut. “The result is warm and inviting,” says designer Jeffrey Bernett. Choose from two sizes: a 60" unit that features two doors and two soft-closing drawers, or an 82" four-door unit. Both include adjustable shelves and space for routing cords to seamlessly exit. Made in the U.S.A.
  • Beautifully crafted storage solution for electronics, books, and more.
  • Streamlined, midcentury-inspired design free of hardware.
  • Solid wood drawers, doors, and legs.
  • Space for routing cords to exit.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Raleigh Collection
General Dimensions
  • 22" H 82" W 18" D
Product Weight
115 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
DWR honors a one (1) year warranty on all products. Brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periods.

title: Edel Credenza
description:
Scandinavian design language meets cutting-edge 3-D molding technology in the Edel Credenza (2018). Easy-to-live-with forms speak quietly but offer hidden delights in use. “We made Edel attractive,” explain the designers, “but the love for it comes when you start interacting with it. When you see how the doors slide across and everything’s fluid.” Unit has space for routing cords behind the adjustable shelves. Cords exit through bottom of cabinet for an unobstructed back. Made in Slovenia.
  • Small version has three adjustable shelves and two drawers.
  • Large version has five adjustable shelves, four drawers, and pullout media player shelf.
  • Space behind shelves for routing cords.
  • Solid wood handles and legs.
  • Soft-close drawers with dovetail joints.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Edel Collection
General Dimensions
  • 28½" H 75" W 20" D
Product Weight
220 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Aura Media Unit
description:
Founded in 1947, the Spanish company Treku specializes in sleek storage units that combine modern and traditional design details. The Aura Media Unit (2011) is an eye-pleasing two-tone storage solution that combines the beauty of clean lines with the durability of fine craftsmanship. The open-frame steel base ensures a visual lightness while also delivering exceptional sturdiness. Aura is finished partly in wood veneer, partly in lacquer for warmth and striking contrast. Made in Spain.
  • Versatile, roomy storage solution for electronics, books, and more.
  • Small Unit: Open cubby, and cabinet with removable shelf.
  • Large Unit: Open cubby, cabinet with removable shelf, and 2 drawers.
  • Small Unit has two cord escapes, Large Unit has three.
  • Push-latch hardware for a clean look.
Brand
Treku
Collection
Aura Collection
General Dimensions
  • 22⅛" H 76⅞" W 18¾" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
